fields.summary: Drag and drop on a new answer doesn't work

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47906].
  {panel}

*Preconditions:*
* Create a question
* Leave 1 answer

*Steps *
* 1. Add "?page=2" to the end of the URL then press Enter key
* => It shows *paging*
* 2. Click Next
* => it shows ?page=3"
* 3. Click Next several times
* => it does not show "1" between Previous and Next links

*Expected:*
* It should not show paging until there are more than 4 answers (current number of answers per a page)
!CQ - paging.gif|thumbnail!

_Notes: You can view the .gif file by opening it in a broswer_
fields.summary: There are only 1 answer - It shows paging when add "?page=2" to URL
Lack of CSRF protection on Voting
Font size of question titles on question lists is too big
Hide 'Ask a question' panel and questions filter in search when unlicensed
Answer Box Not Expanding For Dropped Images

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47899].
  {panel}

Steps to reproduce:
1. Post an answer to a question. In the answer, paste a URL which has an apostrophe in the URL, e.g. https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CONFKB/Editing+or+Deleting+a+Page+That+Won't+Render
2. Save the answer. The URL alias will show the full URL.
3. Hover over or click the URL to check the target. Everything after the apostrophe will be removed.

Example: https://extranet.atlassian.com/questions/2343677488/answers/2344069866
fields.summary: When posting an answer to a question, URLs with apostrophe's are incorrectly truncated
In-line editing labels does not allow a label to be removed
It shows something after a topic

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47894].
  {panel}

When we migrated to Confluence Questions form OSQA, we re-implemented the ability to earn and redeem stuff from the Atlassian Swag store.  The UI to redeem these items can be accessed from the user's own profile page in Confluence.  However, there's a few issues with this:

1) The URL is https://answers.atlassian.com/plugins/swag/myswag.action - not very memorable. We should consider aliasing it to something like "answers.atlassian.com/swag", like it was on the old system.

2) The Confluence user profile is buried pretty deep in Atlassian Answers due to the fact we're operating Confluence Questions in "standalone" mode.  It takes 2-3 clicks to find the swag UI from the Answers homepage.

3) Users aren't notified when they are eligible to claim new items of swag.  We need to rely on the user checking back regularly to know when they've earned something.
fields.summary: The Atlassian Swag store integration on Answers is not discoverable
Japanese questions don't work in Space
Spinner doesn't work by default in Confluence 5.3
RemoveTestDataRule must preserve jira-users and jira-developers groups
Editor toolbar on long answers does not stalk
Adding a topic and then clicking it results in an undefined link
Topic search on topics page doesn't work as anonymous
Upvote email contains a closing tag in text

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47879].
  {panel}

*Steps to reproduce:*
- Run CQ in standalone mode (disable Confluence Spaces plugin)
- Go to Global Permissions (the CQ version)
- Enable anonymous access to Confluence Questions
- Go to the root URL (eg. "http://localhost:1990/conlfuence")

*Expected Behaviour*
- The Confluence Questions index is displayed

*Actual Behaviour*
- The user is redirected to a login prompt

*Cause?*
This seems to happen because Confluence is still respecting the non-CQ, global anonymous usage permissions when accessing the root index of Confluence.  If you enable the Confluence Spaces plugin, go to global permissions and enable *Use Confluence* permissions for anonymous users, then it works as expected once the Confluence Spaces plugin is disabled again.
fields.summary: The root Confluence URL is not accessible to anonymous users in standalone mode, even when anonymous access is enabled
Vote state on question disappears after refresh

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47876].
  {panel}

Labels are essential for "helpers" such as plugin vendors to monitor for questions on their plugins.

The label selection dialog is largely useless as it stands because of all the cruft (see screenshot). Lots of people don't even know how to use labels, they just paste their question there, hence cruft.

The label suggestions should be sorted by popularity... this would cause natural clumping around one or two labels, rather than a distribution of between many. Perhaps even show the number of these labels in parens.

This distribution makes it impossible for me to watch all possible labels.

Not only that, the list is actually truncated with no indication that it's truncated. This makes it impossible for a user to find the correct label for my plugin, eg addon-com.onresolve.jira.groovy.groovyrunner.
fields.summary: labels in CQ version of AAC largely useless because of cruft

fields.description:
When a question gets asked, answered, or commented on, the question/response sometimes does not appear (even after refreshing the page) for 5-10 minutes.

I'm thinking this is because the re-index hasn't happened yet, but I wouldn't mind some confirmation or even a work-around/performance improvement.
fields.summary: Questions/answers/comments sometimes do not appear for 5-10 minutes
Can't connect to server (Acrolinx Scroll)

fields.description:
*Bug Description*

As describe in a new feature available for Confluence questions:

{quote}
Use your existing space permissions - only people who can view the space can search for and see questions that were asked there.{quote}

This will cause misunderstanding as users might think that Questions topics are restricted and won't be seen by users that do not have access to the space mentioned. When this happen, a sensitive topic will be seen by all Confluence users.

*Workaround*

The workaround for now is to use a code name for the sensitive topic so that restricted users won't be able to understand the real topics of it.
fields.summary: Restricted Question topic can be seen by restricted users
Answer excerpts are escaped on the CQ user profile screen
Blacklisted words

  {panel}

* Provision a new OD instance, using the default licence
* Note that CQ is not licenced
* Go the Admin Console
* There is a section in the console for "Confluence Questions" with a 'Configure' link.
* This goes to to /wiki/admin/questions/configure.action

This is confusing, as the customer cannot actually use CQ.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47831].
  {panel}

Users get the "Electric Charlie" screen when loading this question: https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/149631/sourcetree-for-linux

For one user, it doesn't work in Chrome but does work in Safari.  If the user loads the question anonymously in Chrome then it works.

I looked in the application log and couldn't find any relevant exception or error message.

Needs more investigation.
fields.summary: Some users are not able to view the "SourceTree for Linux" question on AAC when logged in and using Chrome
Styles overriding each other

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47828].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Space questions do not appear in the Questions Lists macro filtering by recent Questions or unanswered questions options, even if the spaces are public. This functionality only works when filtering with the 'popular' option. 

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Ask a question in a public Confluence space
# Navigate to a page that has the Questions List macro
# Edit the Questions List macro to Filter by: recent or unanswered
# Save.
# Notice the Questions List will not have the question asked in the public space
# Edit the macro to Filter by: popular
# The question from the space is included

h3. Expected Results
The question should be included in the Recent questions list

h3. Actual Results
The question is only included is the Questions List macro is configured to 'Filter by:' popular
fields.summary: Space Questions Do Not Appear in Questions Lists Macro (Recent Questions/Unanswered Questions)

*Steps to replicate:*

# Check https://example.atlassian.net/wiki/admin/questions/viewpermissions.action

*Result:*

*Expected Result:*

The default confluence users group should be able to access Confluence Questions. It is a poor experience otherwise, as users are unable to access a product they're paying for.
fields.summary: Confluence Questions Permissions are empty when an instance is provisioned
Pavlo Falieiev
No visual feedback for topic icon upload

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47812].
  {panel}

When testing the latest version of Confluence Questions (1.1.0), I tried searching for topics from the topics screen.

A few things I noticed:
1- When typing in a topic to search for, all topics disappear and you must hit enter in order for any search results to appear. This is unlike the other search functions in the site, where results begin to appear as you type.
2- The topic I searched for now appears as a featured topic, which wasn't my intention. Also, there is no way to then watch this now "featured" topic without clicking on the topic and then clicking watch from the next screen, resulting in a bad user experience.
3- If I try to search for another topic that I know is already an existing topic, it does not pull this topic up to the top of the topics displayed. Instead, the same list of topics appears in the same order.
fields.summary: Topic Search Function Doesn't Work

1. Start writing a question or an answer to a question
2. Wait a few minutes
3. Complete your edit and save it
4. Observe the timestamp

Result: Timestamp corresponds to when you started writing, not when you submitted it.

Expected: Timestamp should be set when submitting the question/answer.
fields.summary: Questions/answers get timestamp from when editing starts not on save

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47785].
  {panel}

[~mhowells] reported that this was happening in his pipeline plan, and I checked is happening as well in Confluence pipeline.

This build had the CQ ATs passing successfully: https://confluence-bamboo.internal.atlassian.com/build/result/viewBuildResultsSuccessfulTests.action?buildKey=CONFREL-CONFODREL-DTA&buildNumber=446

The failed though in the next build: https://confluence-bamboo.internal.atlassian.com/build/result/viewBuildResultsQuarantinedTests.action?buildKey=CONFREL-CONFODREL-DTA&buildNumber=447

The instance (confluence-acceptance-tests-dev.jira-dev.com) is healthy, and CQ is licensed after the test run phase.

fields.summary: CQ upgrade task problems on PUG

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47764].
  {panel}

h2. NOTE: You can now un-subscribe yourself from Atlassian Answers notifications.

Simply click the "Un-subscribe from all notifications" link that appears in the email footer of all emails that are now sent from Answers.
Some users may find that clicking the link results in a system error message - even though this happens, the unsubscribe request should still have been processed successfully.

============================
As of 9:11PM PDT (16:11 UTC) I have started receiving a flood of e-mail about confluence. Logging into the site it appears you have recently migrated confluence into Atlassian Answers. This has a broken e-mail notification system.

1. I never signed up to watch Confluence in Topics.
2. I have it set to not send me e-mail for new questions in Topics I do watch.

Please stop it immediately.

*Workaround from Norman Abramovitz:*
===============================
Look at one of the questions and see what topics are associated with it. Unfortunately you cannot search for them since the watch link is not displayed. Manually scan the unordered list to find those topics and see if they display the unwatched link.
* https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/topics

Also, topics that you are watching have a small Eye icon beside it when displayed under a Question.
fields.summary: Many users received unwanted email notifications from Atlassian Answers after migrating to Confluence Questions
Latest question is undefined in topic selector

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47760].
  {panel}

The following question exists in my question list, but I was not able to ban this user.  It user url was showing not questions like it was banned already.  I did page refresh (ie11) as well and the question still remained.  

https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/11446349/free-the-hunger-games-mockingjay---part-1-online-free-m.o.v.i.e-2014-
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/11446328/appletyrnthe-hunger-games-mockingjay---part-1-online-free-live-hd

https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/users?username=herolee98

The movie spammer has been quite active the past couple of days.
fields.summary: Ban this user failed to remove one of its questions.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47759].
  {panel}

I cannot post any answers - Its saying this : Your post was rejected because it contains blacklisted words. Please contact the admin for more information. Why?

This was the answer I posted :

Whats the URL you are using to access the web-item? My first attempt to fix this would be to remove the last "/" from here :
namespace="/admin/plugins/archive/"
Try this too and let me know - we can take it on from there.

For this question:

https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/4981756/stuck-with-page-not-found-when-developing-a-xwork-action

Why is it not allowing me to save the answer??
fields.summary: Cant save my answer
Found duplicate key 'actions' still appearing in the logs
RSS icon missing in 5.3
Popular stream is still off on AAC-CQ

fields.summary: MaxOpenPreparedStatements exception in ExplicitWatchAoUpgradeTask

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47753].
  {panel}

* Ask a question with a long title
* Search for the question in quick nav
* Hover over the result to see the tooltip

Because the question is long, the result will be truncated. The expected behaviour is that the user reads the tooltip to see the entire string. Instead, the tooltip is providing *exactly the same* truncated information.
fields.summary: Useless tooltips for Questions in quick nav

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47752].
  {panel}

I tried to submit a question and got this error.

!screenshot.png|width=600px!

It's probably because I started drafting the question a few hours ago, went to lunch, let my computer goto sleep, then came back and finished it off.

As suggested by the error, I used my browser's "back" button, then re-submitted the form, but to no avail — it would just present me with the same error.

I tried the second suggestion (reloading the page) but that cleared the question editor so I lost my question.
fields.summary: Question content lost after session expires

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-47751].
  {panel}

h3. Summary
Notifications sent to a user mentioned in a question include the 'Like' and 'Manage notifications' links, like the regular Confluence page notifications.

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# With user account A mention user B in a Confluence Question;
# User B receives a notification about the mention;
#* the notification includes the 'Like' and 'Manage notifications' links
# User B clicks the 'Like' link in the mention notification.

h3. Expected Results
There's no 'Like' link in the 

h3. Actual Results
- The links are included in the mention notification:
!https://www.evernote.com/shard/s4/sh/23d2ebe0-b643-47af-82cf-6d6513661cb1/3cefb3058bd938695b80f6a8f0f502cf/deep/0/Screenshot%208/21/14,%205:01%20PM.jpg!

- Clicking the 'Like' link in the mention notification results in a malformed notification sent to user A:
!Screen Shot 2015-06-02 at 16.19.25.png|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Mention Notifications Include 'Like' and 'Manage notifications' Links
Pre's don't wrap in Firefox
Enable nginx caching for Confluence static resources
Too many CQ notifications are generated in clustered EAC
